titleStmt.title: The great and wonderful prophecies of Mr. Patridge, Mr. Coly, Mr. Tanner, and Mr. Andrews. Predicting what may befall this climate of England and other kingdoms, for this year 1689 with the account of the memorable eclipses, and their signification, with other remarkable matters worthy of note.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J. C. in Holbourn,

notesStmt.note: Place of publication and imprint year from Wing.
The words "Mr. Patridge .. Mr Andrews." are bracketed together on the title page.
Imperfect; pages cropped with some loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the Guildhall Library, London.
